channel.title: ggtree on SR-C
channel.description: Recent content in ggtree on SR-C

item.title: ggtree-quickstart
item.description: 安装 1 2 3 4 if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE)) install.packages("BiocManager") BiocManager::install("treeio", version = "3.8") BiocManager::install("ggtree", version = "3.8") 输入 ggtree可以直接文本输入Newick tree 1 2 3 4 library(ggtree) tree_text <- "(((((cow, (whale, dolphin)), (pig2, boar)), camel), fish), seedling);" x <- read.tree(text=tree_text) 也可使用treei
